input_email_body:
Subject: Report of Scanner Malfunction

The scanner has stopped working correctly, leading to the corruption of medical records My name is David Kim.. It might be due to outdated software or malware. I have restarted the scanner, updated the antivirus software, and checked network connectivity. You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.
